description: This file is a JavaScript configuration module for ESLint, utilizing modern module syntax and specific plugins for Next.js projects. It sets up compatibility extensions with Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript configurations.

methods.name: pathname
methods.description: Uses 'path.dirname' to derive directory name from the current filename.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a URL object into a file path.

methods.name: extends
methods.description: method of 'FlatCompat' to extend base ESLint configurations.
